channel.title: [Delta 317] Adding Dragon Claws
channel.description:
I've watched some YouTube videos, but I'm pretty stumped on adding customs. I've had lots of people tell me that it's really easy so can someone help me out.
I need a download link for a Dragon Claws model that includes the special attack, and a step by step guide on how to add the item in.
Thanks,
Anthony

item.title: [Delta 317] Adding Dragon Claws
item.dc:creator: @Thanks Thanks
item.description:
@Thanks wrote:

Lol thats my bad haha

Alright after you get the models and ints.

Go into your client, find the folder named model.

Drag the dclaw models into there.

For the ints. Open up class 8, look for something like this…

Add yours above it or below it

if(i == 9998) //id for item { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wield"; class8.anInt174 = 35086; class8.anInt165 = 35087; class8.anInt200 = 35087; class8.anInt188 = -1; class8.anInt164 = -1; class8.anInt181 = 1300; class8.anInt190 = 498; class8.anInt198 = 1300; class8.anInt169 = -1; class8.anInt194 = -1; class8.aString170 = "Chaotic longsword"; //name class8.aByteArray178 = "A weapon of incredible accuracy.".getBytes(); //examine class8.aByte205 = -11; class8.aByte154 = -11; }

Read full topic
